name: Map Advertisement

rules: For clients who have become accustomed to free creative, we can give them the next batch for free, and begin to charge from there.

product_description: Bring your brand to life on the Chicago Does Interactive Visitor Mapâ€”the only citywide printed and digital map trusted by Chicago hotel concierges. Your map advertisement connects directly with thousands of visitors through 150+ hotels and attractions, featuring your logo, visuals, and a QR link to your digital listing. Ideal for highlighting must-visit destinations, dining, and entertainment options, this ad keeps your business in front of guests when they decide where to go next.
